title: Is We Dumb? | Taco. Paint Can. Shark. Chainsaw Bear.
description:
Do you think renaming "shark attacks" to "negative experiences with a shark" will help anything? Probably not. Let's talk about that, a woman who wont stop pooping on her neighbor's lawn, a local taco lady who hates literally everyone, cutting your lawn using only scissors, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/U6LImikeAPc
